title: Girl Trouble
description: FIRST-TIMERS, TWO-TIMERS AND SECOND CHANCES:Joan Majors is, in her own words, a faithless, bragging womanizer, but when she meets sexy first-timer and new divorcee, Annette Martineau, she falls head over high-heels in love with her and vows to mend those wicked ways. That's good news to Annette because if there's one thing she really can't stand, it's a faithless, bragging womanizer. Especially one itching to get her in bed. GIRL TROUBLE tells the love story and rocky romance of Joan and Annette if five tales and includes the popular Amazon-Short "Dear Joan." From the author of the acclaimed novel, THE SECRET KEEPING.(GIRL TROUBLE is also available in paperback on Amazon.com)
author: Francine Saint Marie
